comments:
I got this exception pasting some code inside a java editor.

I get it almost each time I save a compilation unit.

This happens while editing bug file. The javadoc of Thread.start() indicates
that this exception occurs when the thread is already started.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 40549 ***
